I agree that any recordings I make using the ROUND:Cambridge app will become a part of the ROUND:Cambridge exhibit and can be used by Halsey Burgund for any related purpose. \n\n Thanks and enjoy!

Welcome to ROUND:Cambridge! 
You have version 1.0.2 
 
This app is your portal into the participatory audio world of the 'ROUND:Cambridge' installation by Halsey Burgund. This project is commissioned by the Cambridge Arts Council and is accessible from anywhere within the city limits of Cambridge, MA, USA. 
Please listen, add your own comments and explore the city and the public art within it. 
 
Special thanks to: 
Rob Knapen - Android app development 
Mike MacHenry and Ben McAllister - server development 
Joe Zobkiw - iPhone app development 
Benjamin Dauer - additional graphics 
 
More info at: http://halseyburgund.com/work/r2c
